author: VinInn
body:
see

https://indico.cern.ch/event/841666/contributions/3583433/attachments/1918082/3171950/SpeedingStripCluster.pdf
 and

https://indico.cern.ch/event/841668/contributions/3612166/attachments/1934026/3204280/SpeedingStripClusterUpdate.pdf


to run it just
```
from RecoLocalTracker.SiStripClusterizer.SiStripClustersFromZSRawFacility_cfi import SiStripClustersFromZSRawFacility as _siStripClusters
process.siStripClusters = _siStripClusters.clone()
```
title: Strip Clusterizer from Zero Suppressed Readout
